articles.description: And now new research suggests that the cause of both of these is the destruction of an asteroid by a magnetar.
articles.content: Recently astronomers have been able to associate two seemingly unrelated phenomena: an explosive event known as a fast radio burst and the change in speed of a spinning magnetar. And now new research… [+2971 chars]
